# sitecore_edge_client (Resource)

Manages a Sitecore Edge automation client



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The environment ID for the Edge client
- `name` (String) The name of the Edge client
- `project_id` (String) The project ID for the Edge client

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the Edge client

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) The client ID for authentication
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The client secret for authentication
- `id` (String) The ID of the Edge client
